page.title: 05Working in Carnoustie.
page.content: Carnoustie and the area to the east of the town is mainly a residential area which is popular with tourists. For that reason,there is no real industry that can provide residents with jobs. Most people who work in Carnoustie are involved in tourism.There are many shops which sell items which camping holiday-makers would need and, of course,these shops are needed and used by residents too.There are also several souvenir shops which become much busier in the summer. Since tourism is important,it is fairly easy for people to find themselves casual employment over the summer.Working in the hotels and on the golf courses are just two examples. In general there is no noticeable unemployment problem in the area.
